channel.title: [1.5.2] Corona | Hardcore Survival [Public]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.legious.org/forums/Themes/minecraft_theme_ok/images/logo.png[/img] [b]Welcome to Legious, a Minecraft survival server dedicated to the hardcore aspect of vanilla Minecraft. The goal of this server is to provide a hardcore feeling in a SMP, while also encouraging cooperation and teamwork. Mobs are harder than ever, hunger may prove to be fatal, so prepare for one of the hardest SMP experiences you have ever come across![/b][/center]
[hr]
[b][size=18px]Difficulty Information:[/size][/b] This server isn't 100% hardcore, but we do make it as hard as possible.
[ul][li]Mobs deal greater damage than usual[/li] [li]You can die of hunger if the food bar completely depletes[/li] [li]Creepers will not cancel their attack unless you travel a greater distance away from them than usual[/li] [li]Zombies will attempt to break down doors[/li] [li]All poisonous effects caused by mobs will be in play; this includes poisonous spiders and withers[/li] [li]Mobs are more likely to spawn with armor[/li] [li]You [b][i]do not[/i] [/b]lose any account data or have any restrictions upon death[/li][/ul] There are more cool facts that you can take a look at by clicking [url=http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Difficulty]here[/url].
[hr]
[b][size=18px]Plugins:[/size][/b] We do use a selection of plugins to provide functionality and security within the server, and they are all listed below:
[ul][li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/autorank/]AutoRank[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/coreprotect/]CoreProtect[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/essentials/]Essentials[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/antixray/]FAntiXRay[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/lockette/]Lockette[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/multiverse-core/]Multiverse-Core[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/permissionsex/]PermissionsEx[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/rate-xray/]RateOfXray[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/vault/]Vault[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/worldedit/]WorldEdit[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/worldguard/]WorldGuard[/url][/li] [li][url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/zavautomessager/]ZavAutoMessager[/url][/li][/ul] These plugins may or may not be removed in the future, because we are always looking for better ways to provide functionality while maintaining top notch server performance.
[hr]
[b][size=18px]Links:[/size][/b]
[ul][li][url=http://www.legious.org]Website[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.legious.org/forums/]Forums[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.legious.org/stats]Player stats[/url][/li][/ul]
[hr]
[b]Staff Team:[/b] You should only report issues to any of the following members of our staff team:
[ul][li]Owner: Versalink[/li] [li]Admin: Aroz (therabidtaco)[/li] [li]Admin: Sloth (Trade_Digits)[/li][/ul] Our staff team is there to provide any help they can to make sure your experience on Legious is great. Please do not trust anyone with your account credentials, as we are not responsible for anything that happens to your account.
[hr]
[b][size=18px]Connection Information:[/size][/b] Playing is quick and easy, and doesn't require any type of registration. If you are interested in playing Legious, feel free to connect using the following IP/port: [b]198.23.148.114:25597[/b]
[hr]
[b]NOTIFICATION[/b][b]:[/b]The server is coming across a lot of change as we grow and notice any flaws in our current methodology, so please bare with us if you find anything to be different than usual. This forum thread also has a chance of changing in the future. This should not affect your general game-play, so don't worry! [b]The server is now officially known as [i]Legious[/i].[/b]

item.title: [1.5.2] Corona | Hardcore Survival [Public]
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:4, topic:523299”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=641850.msg4323526#msg4323526 date=1372528556]a Minecraft survival server dedicated to the hardcore aspect of vanilla Minecraft
[/quote]
YESYESYESYESYES

I might get on sometime soon and try this out![/quote]
The doors are always open. Hope to see you soon!

Also, I’m not sure if anyone tried to connect anytime from 8:00PM-11:00PM EST, but the server was down due to a power outage in the location of the node, but everything is back up and running better than ever!

Read full topic

item.title: [1.5.2] Corona | Hardcore Survival [Public]
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[center]
Welcome to Legious, a Minecraft survival server dedicated to the hardcore aspect of vanilla Minecraft. The goal of this server is to provide a hardcore feeling in a SMP, while also encouraging cooperation and teamwork. Mobs are harder than ever, hunger may prove to be fatal, so prepare for one of the hardest SMP experiences you have ever come across![/center]

[hr]

[size=18px]Difficulty Information:[/size]
This server isn’t 100% hardcore, but we do make it as hard as possible.

[ul][li]Mobs deal greater damage than usual[/li]
[li]You can die of hunger if the food bar completely depletes[/li]
[li]Creepers will not cancel their attack unless you travel a greater distance away from them than usual[/li]
[li]Zombies will attempt to break down doors[/li]
[li]All poisonous effects caused by mobs will be in play; this includes poisonous spiders and withers[/li]
[li]Mobs are more likely to spawn with armor[/li]
[li]You do not lose any account data or have any restrictions upon death[/li][/ul]
There are more cool facts that you can take a look at by clicking here.

[hr]

[size=18px]Plugins:[/size]
We do use a selection of plugins to provide functionality and security within the server, and they are all listed below:

[ul][li]AutoRank[/li]
[li]CoreProtect[/li]
[li]Essentials[/li]
[li]FAntiXRay[/li]
[li]Lockette[/li]
[li]Multiverse-Core[/li]
[li]PermissionsEx[/li]
[li]RateOfXray[/li]
[li]Vault[/li]
[li]WorldEdit[/li]
[li]WorldGuard[/li]
[li]ZavAutoMessager[/li][/ul]
These plugins may or may not be removed in the future, because we are always looking for better ways to provide functionality while maintaining top notch server performance.

[hr]

[size=18px]Links:[/size]

[ul][li]Website[/li]
[li]Forums[/li]
[li]Player stats[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Staff Team:
You should only report issues to any of the following members of our staff team:

[ul][li]Owner: Versalink[/li]
[li]Admin: Aroz (therabidtaco)[/li]
[li]Admin: Sloth (Trade_Digits)[/li][/ul]
Our staff team is there to provide any help they can to make sure your experience on Legious is great. Please do not trust anyone with your account credentials, as we are not responsible for anything that happens to your account.

[hr]

[size=18px]Connection Information:[/size]
Playing is quick and easy, and doesn’t require any type of registration. If you are interested in playing Legious, feel free to connect using the following IP/port:
198.23.148.114:25597

[hr]

NOTIFICATION:The server is coming across a lot of change as we grow and notice any flaws in our current methodology, so please bare with us if you find anything to be different than usual. This forum thread also has a chance of changing in the future. This should not affect your general game-play, so don’t worry!
The server is now officially known as Legious.
